en.title: Cat Parasite Prevention: A Guide to Flea, Tick, and Roundworm Control
en.content:
Even indoor cats are not completely free from parasite risks. Owners can bring parasites in from outside, or infection can occur when introducing a new cat to the household.

Common External Parasites

Fleas

The most common external parasite in cats. They cause itching and can lead to allergic dermatitis and tapeworm transmission. Monthly spot-on (topical) treatments can effectively prevent fleas.

Ticks

More common in outdoor cats, but humans can bring them indoors as well. Ticks can transmit serious diseases such as SFTS (Severe Fever with Thrombocytopenia Syndrome), so caution is necessary.

Common Internal Parasites

Roundworms

Common in kittens and can be transmitted from the mother cat. They cause diarrhea and abdominal bloating.

Tapeworms

Transmitted through fleas. If you notice small white rice-grain-like segments around your cat's rear end, tapeworm infection is a possibility.

Key Prevention Measures

Regular deworming (as directed by your veterinarian) and routine flea prevention medication are the basics. Fuluck Cattery performs deworming before handing over all kittens.

zh.title: 猫咪寄生虫预防：跳蚤、蜱虫与蛔虫的防治指南
zh.content:
即使是室内猫，也并非完全没有寄生虫风险。主人可能从外面带入寄生虫，迎接新猫时也可能发生感染。

常见体外寄生虫

跳蚤

猫咪最常见的体外寄生虫。会引起瘙痒，还可能导致过敏性皮炎和绦虫传播。每月使用一次滴剂（外用驱虫药）即可有效预防。

蜱虫

多见于外出的猫咪，但人类也可能将其带入室内。蜱虫可传播SFTS（发热伴血小板减少综合征）等严重感染症，需要特别注意。

常见体内寄生虫

蛔虫

在幼猫中较为常见，也可能由母猫传染。会导致腹泻和腹部膨胀。

绦虫

通过跳蚤传播。如果在猫咪肛门周围发现类似米粒的白色虫体，则可能感染了绦虫。

预防要点

定期驱虫（遵医嘱）和定期使用跳蚤预防药是基本措施。福楽猫舍在交付幼猫之前会完成驱虫处理。
